name: Ribbon (itch) (Sir_Silver, Firehawk)
description:
Controls 

  • Arrows - Move/Climb
  • Space - Jump (hold for higher jump)
  • Shift - Dash(directional with arrow keys)
  • Z - Hold Wall
  • Green orbs will reset your dash! Also touching the ground will reset it.

Story - Cuz we didn't get to add it to the game.

Ribbon, a young scientist working at a powerful mining company has a terrible accident when an earthquake strikes. Many manage to flee before it's too late, but some were trapped inside the wreckage of the facility. Months have passed since her accident, and she finds herself awake in the facility all alone. Help her to escape and find out what's happened!

Note - 

  • Game CAN'T be beaten! (Last level we made was the elevator level if you get there you won!
  • There are sadly no earthquakes in this version.
  • Collectibles don't work yet.
  • If your game looks crangled, TURN OFF WINDOWS DPI STUFF!
